characterization.PXRD: Rigaku MiniFlex II X-ray diffractometer using Cu Kα radiation (λ=1.5418 Å) in the 2θ angular range 4–40° with a step size of 0.02° at 293 K
characterization.TG: SETARAM LABSYS equipment at a heating rate of 10 °C min−1 under nitrogen gas flow in the range of 30-800 °C
characterization.FT-IR: Nicolet 5DX spectrometer using KBr pellets in the range of 4000–400 cm−1
characterization.Photochromic_properties: Determined upon ultraviolet light irradiation (22.4 mw/cm2)
characterization.Cyclic_voltammetry: CHI 660E electrochemical analyzer (Shanghai) with a modified glassy carbon electrode (GCE) as the working electrode, a platinum wire as the counter electrode, an Ag–AgCl electrode as reference electrode
characterization.EPR: Bruker EMX spectrometer using an X-band microwave bridge (9.45 GHz)
characterization.X-ray_single-crystal_diffraction: Agilent Technologies Gemini EOS diffractometer with Cu−Kα radiation (λ = 1.5418 Å) at room temperature
